recommended_treatment: Systemic therapy with or without external beam radiation therapy
description: High-grade uterine serous carcinoma with full-thickness myometrial invasion, cervical stromal involvement, serosal extension, and omental metastases consistent with pT3a pNX pM1 (FIGO IVB).
patient_notes: This report shows a high-grade uterine cancer that has spread to the lining of the abdomen (omentum) and cervix. You have stage IVB disease, and we recommend systemic chemotherapy with consideration of radiation therapy. We will work together to plan your treatment and support you throughout the process.

verification.assessment: All extracted fields are accurate; FIGO IVB staging and pT3a pNX pM1 pathologic staging are correctly identified, and treatment recommendation aligns with NCCN guidelines for Stage IVB uterine serous carcinoma.
